assessment-question.definition: To what extent does the Member State report the criteria elements required by the 2017 Decision?

answers.option: 76-100% of criteria elements are reported
51-75% of criteria elements are reported
26-50% of criteria elements are reported
1-25% of criteria elements are reported
Not criteria element reported
Not relevant

scoring.option: 76-100% of criteria elements are reported
51-75% of criteria elements are reported
26-50% of criteria elements are reported
1-25% of criteria elements are reported
Not reported

assessment-question.definition: To what extent does the Member State report key aspects of its assessment methodology?

answers.option: All key aspects of methodology reported for this criterion
Three key aspect of methodology reported for this criterion
Two key aspects of methodology reported for this criterion
One key aspect of methodology not reported for this criterion
No key aspects of methodology reported for this criterion
Not relevant

scoring.option: Most (76-100% across criteria) key aspects of methodology are reported
Many (51-75% across criteria) key aspects of methodology are reported
Some (26-50% across criteria) key aspects of methodology are reported
A few (1-25% across criteria) key aspects of methodology are reported
Not reported / No key aspects of assessment methodology reported

assessment-question.definition: Does the assessment provide a conclusion on the current status?

answers.option: All (of parameter, criterion and elements) reported with status assessment for this criterion)
Two (of parameter, criterion and elements) reported with status assessment for this criterion
One (of parameter, criterion and elements) reported with status assessment for this criterion
None (of parameter, criterion and elements) reported with status assessment for this criterion
Not relevant

scoring.option: Most (76-100% across criteria) of parameters, criteria and elements reported with status assessment
Many (51-75% across criteria) of parameters, criteria and elements reported with status assessment
Some (26-50% across criteria) of parameters, criteria and elements reported with status assessment
A few (1-25% across criteria) of parameters, criteria and elements are reported with status assessment
No parameters, criteria and elements reported with status assessments

assessment-question.definition: Is an assessment of the extent of pressure, impacts or good state reported?

answers.option: Extent of pressure is reported for this criterion
Extent of impact is reported for this criterion
Extent of good state is reported for this criterion
Extent of pressure is not reported for this criterion
Extent of impact is not reported for this criterion
Extent of good state is not reported for this criterion
Not relevant

scoring.option: Extent of pressures, impacts or good state reported for 76-100% of the criteria elements
Extent of pressures, impacts or good state reported for 51-75% of the criteria elements
Extent of pressures, impacts or good state reported for 26-50% of the criteria elements
Extent of pressures, impacts or good state reported for 1-25% of the criteria elements
Extent of pressures, impacts or good state reported not reported

assessment-question.definition: To what extent does the Member State report the same elements as other MS in the region?

answers.option: Element(s) used for this criterion is/are the same as most (76-100%) MS in the region
Element(s) used for this criterion is/are the same as many (51-75%) MS in the region
Element(s) used for this criterion is/are the same as some (26-50%) MS in the region
Element(s) used for this criterion is/are the same as a few (1-25%) MS in the region
Not relevant
Not comparable

scoring.option: The MS uses the same elements as most (76-100%) MS in the region
The MS uses the same elements as many (51-75%) MS in the region
The MS uses the same elements as some (26-50%) MS in the region
Element(s) used for this criterion is/are the same as in a few (1-25%) MS in the region
Not reported\the information is provided in different formats across MS and it is impossible to compare

assessment-question.definition: To what extent does the Member State report the same parameters as the other MS in the region?

answers.option: Parameter(s) used for this criterion is/are the same as in most (76%-100%) of the MS in the region

Parameter(s) used for this criterion is/are the same as in less than half (26-50%) of MS in the region
Parameter(s) used for this criterion is/are the same as in few (1-25%) of MS in the region
Not relevant
Not comparable

scoring.option: The MS uses the same parameters as most (76%-100%) of the MS in the region
The MS uses the same parameters as more than half (51-75%) of MS in the region
The MS uses the same parameters as less than half (26-50%) of MS in the region
Parameter(s) used for this criterion is/are the same as in few (1-25%) of MS in the region
Not reported\the information is provided in different formats across MS and it is impossible to compare

Status partially assessed against the latest GES determination (2018) for this criterion
Status not assessed against the latest GES determination for this criterion
